JsonUtil.RegisterEmptyModuleCustomizer
 
ManagedRunnable<E>
Global logic is the following:
A Priority queue managed by a comparator function A list of runnable tasks (as much as maxRunnable) ready to run in a round robin fashion When poll is called, if not enough elements are in the runnable tasks, the queue is reprioritized through reprioritize function (O(n.log(n) at max, O(1) at min) and then missing elements are taken out of the priority queue to the runnable task list If the task must be resubmitted (whatever the logic), addContinue shall be called and the task will be add at the end of the runnable list If e task must be removed from this structure, the remove will use the findEquals function Note that if elements were polled before while an element is polled, the runnable list could be larger than maxRunnable.
ProducerConsumerLock
Producer-Consumer lock implementation : (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Producer%E2%80%93consumer_problem) Inspired from https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/concurrent/locks/Condition.html implementation Implements Closeable - When closed, all locks are unlocked.
QuarkusProperties
Configurable values
QuarkusSystemPropertyUtil
A collection of utility methods to retrieve and parse the values of the Java system properties and from ConfigProvider.

StateMachine<E>
This is the base class for the basic support of Finite State Machine.
StateTransition<E>
Transition object that joins one state and one set of acceptable following states.
TeeInputStream
